layman_task: Your task is to move to the base area only if you are holding a scrap part, not holding a good part, and currently in the waste area.
technical_task: if you are holding a scrap part and if you are in the waste and if you are holding a good part then go to the base.
spoon_task: if you are holding a scrap part and if you are in the waste area and if you are holding a good part then seek the base area.

layman_task: Your task is to find any part (good or scrap), pick it up, and then go to the base area.
technical_task: if you detect a scrap part then pick up the part and then go to the base.
spoon_task: if you detect a scrap part then pick up the part and then seek the base area.

layman_task: Your task is to go to the base area if you are holding a part of any type.
technical_task: if you are holding a good part and if you are in the base then go to the base.
spoon_task: if you are holding a good part and if you are in the base area then seek the base area.

layman_task: Your task is to pick up a good part if it is detected nearby.
technical_task: if you detect a good part then pick up the part.
spoon_task: if you detect a good part then pick up the part.
